required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Use of the Zenith速 Dissection Endovascular System to Treat Patients With Acute, Complicated Type B Aortic Dissection
clinical_study.official_title: Use of the Zenith速 Dissection Endovascular System in the Treatment of Patients With Acute, Complicated Type B Aortic Dissection

brief_summary.textblock: The Zenith速 Dissection Endovascular System is indicated for the treatment of patients with acute, complicated type B aortic dissection.

intervention.description: Instead of making a large incision in the chest, the physician makes a small incision near each hip to insert, and guides the study device(s) into place in the aorta.

criteria.textblock:
Exclusion Criteria:
- Less than 18 years of age
